name: Russian Oligarch!
description:
Rise through the ranks from a regular Russian guy to a billionaire. Change your destiny in a developing Russia. Climb to the tops through all Russian bureaucratic and criminal difficulties. Swipe money as it is a passport to happiness. Make business with your mob, racket the small ventures, invest in Russian companies like Gazprom, cooperate with Kremlin, become a friend of Puitn.
Vodka, matreshka and balalaika will be your companions in making money in Russia.
